name: DAS Technology - Satellite Broadband
overview:
Satellite Broadband means no more waiting.

If you are fed up of your slow internet connection, whether it is due to a poor quality landline or unreliable 3G mobile coverage, your days of staring at the egg timer could soon be over.

Wherever you live in the UK and Europe, DAS can deliver satellite broadband to you. Meaning no more waiting.

In many rural areas and some cities too, the phone lines aren’t good enough quality to deliver fast, high quality broadband. But if you are reading this, you already know this! Because our satellite internet technology transmits the internet signal to you via satellite, it is guaranteed to give you a top quality, no-waiting, service at any time. With a choice of 6Mb, 8Mb and 10Mb services, plus professional and bespoke satellite broadband packages available upon request, we’ve got the satellite broadband package that’s right for you.
